snippet.title: Sakura Wars Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore 1940s steampunk Tokyo and lead your squad to prestige when Sakura Wars launches April 28.
 
Bursting with art and culture, Sakura Wars presents the perfect backdrop for a winding tale of romance, warfare, and redemption. Pre-order now: https://games.sega.com/sakurawars/
